name: auth-lockout-screen
description: Account locked page after too many failed login attempts with countdown timer, animated lock icon, and alternative unlock methods
postMessage:
Account lockout screen installed at app/locked/page.tsx.
Access at /locked. Requires a cn() utility at lib/utils.ts (clsx + tailwind-merge).

Usage:
  Navigate to /locked?attempts=5&maxAttempts=5&duration=900

Query params (all optional):
  - attempts: number of failed attempts (default 5)
  - maxAttempts: max allowed attempts (default 5)
  - duration: lockout duration in seconds (default 900 = 15 min)

Requires shadcn/ui: npx shadcn@latest add button card
